stochastic_function: lambda study_decision: {1: 0.899999 if study_decision == 'study more' else 0.3, 0: 0.100001 if study_decision == 'study more' else 0.5, -1: 0.0 if study_decision == 'study more' else 0.2}
lambda study_decision: {1: 0.6, 0: 0.3, -1: 0.1} if study_decision == "study less" else {1: 0.4, 0: 0.4, -1: 0.2}

lambda current_knowledge, health_status, exam_difficulty: {1: 0.7 if health_status == 1 and exam_difficulty == -1 else 0.6 if health_status == 1 and exam_difficulty == 0 else 0.5 if health_status == 1 and exam_difficulty == 1 else 0.6 if health_status == 0 and exam_difficulty == -1 else 0.5 if health_status == 0 and exam_difficulty == 0 else 0.4 if health_status == 0 and exam_difficulty == 1 else 0.5 if health_status == -1 and exam_difficulty == -1 else 0.4 if health_status == -1 and exam_difficulty == 0 else 0.3, 0: 0.2 if health_status == 1 and exam_difficulty == -1 else 0.3 if health_status == 1 and exam_difficulty == 0 else 0.4 if health_status == 1 and exam_difficulty == 1 else 0.3 if health_status == 0 and exam_difficulty == -1 else 0.4 if health_status == 0 and exam_difficulty == 0 else 0.5 if health_status == 0 and exam_difficulty == 1 else 0.4 if health_status == -1 and exam_difficulty == -1 else 0.5 if health_status == -1 and exam_difficulty == 0 else 0.6, -1: 0.1}
